description:
If you’re thinking about starting a business, there is no time like the present! Never have there been so many opportunities.

However, the failure rate for new businesses is high – some say as high as 90% in the first year. And, the economy and competition, not just locally but globally is also making it even more difficult. So you need something to help you beat the odds – and the “7 Secrets of Successful Business Owners” can help!

I have over 20 years’ experience working with business owners and I designed this class to give you a glimpse into some of the elements necessary to build a successful business today so that if you decide to take the leap, you will have a solid foundation to start with. In less than one-hour (no fluff included), I will share 7 secrets and how to structure them in your business plan or incorporate them into your existing business. The 7 secrets work whether you have a product, a service or a combination of the two.

So what does it take to build a successful business today…one that can stand the test of time? I’ll provide some of the answers in this class as we explore each of the 7 secrets. I’ll also include some examples, some do’s and don’ts and give you the opportunity to start working on your business idea with exercises and worksheets.

So let’s not waste another minute, let’s get started!
title: Start-Up Strategies: 7 Secrets of Successful Business Owners
